## {gtsummary} installation

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%" }
Install production version from CRAN:

```{r}
#| eval: false
install.packages("gtsummary")
```
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
Install development version from GitHub:

```{r}
#| eval: false
remotes::install_github("ddsjoberg/gtsummary")
```
:::
:::

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| out-width: '100%'
#| fig-asp: 0.375
library(ggplot2)

cranlogs::cran_downloads("gtsummary", from = "2019-05-05") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = cumsum(count))) +
  geom_area(fill = "#7090A5", alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    expand = c(0, 0), 
    labels = style_number,
    n.breaks = 6
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    expand = c(0, 0),
    labels = function(x) format(lubridate::as_date(x), format = "%b %Y"),
    n.breaks = 6
  ) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Cumulative Downloads") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 15, family = "Atkinson Hyperlegible"))
```
